title: Letting go
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Conflict of generations
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenagers - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Conflict of generations
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Conflict of generations
description: This drama explores the communication difficulties and differences in values between the generations in a fairly typical Australian family. Conflict reaches a crisis point when the seventeen-year-old daughter decides to leave home and live with her boyfriend. Cast includes: Robyn Nevin, John Ewart, Karena Menzie, Miranda Cartledge, Jeremy Scrivener, Phillip Priest.
